channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 08:13 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 08:13 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. #Мыривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Myrivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 07:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Myrivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter! #Мыривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 07:47 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 07:47 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports. #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
